title: WTB: T206 Beater Three Finger Brown and Mathewson

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Beater Three Finger Brown and Mathewson
posts.post_content:
Hello I am looking for a low grade/beater of Three Finger Brown and Christy Mathewson from the T206 set.  I do not care which pose or back that the cards have.  If anyone has any please message me through the board or at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]  thanks

Tony Turner
